topic: Comprehensive analysis of B-based catalysts for oxidative dehydrogenation of propane (ODHP): Multi-dimensional design of active sites, reaction mechanisms, and implications for future catalyst development
QuestionEnglish: How does the systematic study of B-based catalysts for oxidative dehydrogenation of propane (ODHP), including the multi-dimensional design of active sites and analysis of surface and gas-phase reaction mechanisms, enhance our understanding of catalytic processes, and what are its implications for developing more efficient ODHP catalysts in the future?
QuestionChinese: 对于丙烷氧化脱氢(ODHP)的硼基催化剂的系统研究，包括多维活性位点设计和表面及气相反应机理分析，如何增进我们对催化过程的理解，以及这对未来开发更高效的ODHP催化剂有何启示？
